author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bce, depositi o/n in rialzo a 690,242 mld euro, prestiti a 39 mln Bond |
text: FRANKFURT, Feb 5 (Reuters) - The European Central Bank reported the following daily data on liquidity provision, in millions of euros. TODAY PREV Use of overnight loan facility 39 65 Use of overnight deposit facility 690,242 679,463 For additional details click here For details of previous ECB overnight lending operations, see: here For data on ECB market operations please click For Reuters calculation of money market liquidity level please click .
